pair.title: Waste calendar
pair.desc: Fill your address below to see if your municipality uses MinRenovasjon to show waste collection calendar.

status.calendar_found_desc: We found a waste calendar for your address! Please check that it matches your provider's waste calendar.
status.no_calendar_desc: We found no waste calendar for your address. Please check that you have entered the correct address, and that your municipality uses MinRenovasjon.
status.address_error_desc: Sorry, we could not find information about your address. You may have entered it incorrectly, or your address is not registered in the map.

error.no_calendar: Found no waste calendar for this address
